Text.Page:
A hood? I don't make those anymore.

Luria fibers and sun essence are easy to come by, but innerlid leather? You can't even find that in a museum, these days."I already have some."

Oh, my! You actually have some?

Quick! Let's make you a hood! What tailor-made color would you like?"Well..."

Look: Innerlid leather only comes from the eyelids of certain breeds of dracolothâ€”and that particular breed doesn't exist anymore.

Hunted to extinction for their eyelids, of all things...
